title: Add tk next --awaiting for human mode
description:
Add support for humans to query tasks awaiting their attention:

```bash
# Human's next task (any type)
tk next epic-123 --awaiting

# Human's next approval to review  
tk next epic-123 --awaiting approval

# Human's next content or review task
tk next epic-123 --awaiting content,review

# Human's next task across all epics
tk next --awaiting
```

Implementation in ticks client:
```go
func (c *Client) NextAwaitingTask(epicID string, awaitingTypes ...string) (*Task, error) {
    args := []string{"next"}
    if epicID != "" {
        args = append(args, epicID)
    }
    args = append(args, "--awaiting")
    if len(awaitingTypes) > 0 {
        args = append(args, strings.Join(awaitingTypes, ","))
    }
    // ... parse result
}
```

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] --awaiting flag returns tasks awaiting human
- [ ] Can filter by specific awaiting types
- [ ] Works with or without epic-id
- [ ] Returns null if no tasks awaiting
closed_reason: Added NextAwaitingTask(epicID, awaitingTypes...) method to ticks Client. Calls tk next with --awaiting flag, optional epic ID, and optional comma-separated awaiting types filter. Returns nil for no awaiting tasks. Added 5 tests covering arg construction for all parameter combinations, response parsing, and type filtering.
